attributes.action: require that MP's expenses be fully itemised and routinely published in order to ensure the public's trust in those holding public office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK public elects Members of Parliament (MPs) to represent their interests and concerns in the House of Commons. Their conduct reflects the state of UK society, and as such they should be held accountable to the highest standards in all aspects of their conduct. 

Ensuring that public money and other resources are used properly and efficiently is of paramount importance in ensuring the public's trust in Parliament. Therefore, and in line with the best practices of any efficient organisation, MP's expenses should be fully itemised and routinely published to provide an incentive for prudent expenditure and to improve MPs' accountability to the voting public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
